attributes.action: Death Sentence for the likes of Mark Bridger & Stuart Hazell
attributes.additional_details:
This is a petition to call for the death sentence for the likes of Mark Bridger and Stuart Hazell.

These evil monsters abused and took the lives of two very young, innocent vulnerable girls.

We can only think of what horror and pain these poor girls suffered, I call on the death penalty to be enshirned in law for discretional use for evil people that commits acts such as what Mark Bridger and Stuart Hazell have done.
